actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Pedro Sagasti-Bilbao and Sylvia Alvarez de Sagasti and their children Karyn Sagasti-Alvarez, Veronica Del Pilar Sagasti-Alvarez, and Pedro Sagasti-Alvarez.

summary.text: Declares five individuals lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Pedro Sagasti-Bilbao and Sylvia Alvarez de Sagasti and their children Karyn Sagasti-Alvarez, Veronica Del Pilar Sagasti-Alvarez, and Pedro Sagasti-Alvarez.
